3: Are you planning to keep pestering us?
Nanami doesn't want to answer you.
Which team do you belong to? Under who's commands?
As if Nanami would do something as boring as joining a team!
At least we're all Constructs from Babylonia, so—
Ah... You're color's cute too! And fiery! And cool! Nanami will allow you to be friends with Nanami!
I can't understand her.
Wait, you just said 'cute too'?
Nanami, did you see...
A cute Construct?
Yep, the one I saw last time, very cute! Pink!
That's Liv!
Can you tell us where you last saw her?
Be friends with Nanami and I'll tell you! Nanami still doesn't know your name.
I'm Lucia. I'm not sure if I can do it, but I'll try to be a good friend.
Okay, let Nanami try to remember! Hm—
Please, she's our friend and we really want to find her!
Please, Nanami.
I remember! Just now! Over—there! Go find her then.
Remember to let me see your M.I.N.D. next time!
